headline: Rail merger: Lifetime job is great “until you’re stuck in it”
summary: History suggests a trade of job guarantees for union support of a UP-NS merger might not be all it seems. The post Rail merger: Lifetime job is great “until you’re stuck in it” appeared first on FreightWaves.
